Broken Product Page.heading: Check Server Status
Broken Product Page.description: Verify if the server is down and check the server logs for any critical errors that might cause the page to break.

Broken Product Page.heading: Validate URL Routing
Broken Product Page.description: Ensure that the URL routing is correctly configured to the product page. Check .htaccess and router settings.

Broken Product Page.heading: Update Product Links
Broken Product Page.description: Review and update all product links in the content management system to ensure they are not broken.

Product Page Taken Offline by Error.heading: Audit CMS Entries
Product Page Taken Offline by Error.description: Check the CMS for any incorrect settings or errors that could lead to the product page being taken offline.

Product Page Taken Offline by Error.heading: Restore from Backup
Product Page Taken Offline by Error.description: If the page was taken offline by error, restore it from the most recent backup if available.

Slow Loading Product Page.heading: Optimize Images
Slow Loading Product Page.description: Reduce the file size of images without losing quality to enhance page loading speed.

Slow Loading Product Page.heading: Minimize HTTP Requests
Slow Loading Product Page.description: Combine CSS and JavaScript files where possible to reduce the number of server requests.

Broken Images or Missing Media.heading: Check Image Paths
Broken Images or Missing Media.description: Ensure all image paths are correct and the images are uploaded to the server.

Broken Images or Missing Media.heading: Enable Lazy Loading
Broken Images or Missing Media.description: Implement lazy loading for images to improve page load times and handle missing images gracefully.

Broken Link.heading: Validate Hyperlinks
Broken Link.description: Regularly check and validate all hyperlinks on the site to ensure they are not broken.

Broken Link.heading: Implement Redirects
Broken Link.description: Set up server-side redirects for any links that have changed to maintain SEO and user experience.

Broken Links to Product Page.heading: Audit Product URLs
Broken Links to Product Page.description: Conduct a full audit of all product URLs to ensure they match the live URLs in the inventory system.

Broken Links to Product Page.heading: Update Link Sources
Broken Links to Product Page.description: Update any outdated links in the marketing materials or on affiliate sites.
